scripts.migrate:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_DEVELOPMENT npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_PRODUCTION npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.prisma:push: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_DEVELOPMENT npx prisma db push
scripts.deploy:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_DEVELOPMENT npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_PRODUCTION npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.generate:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL npx prisma generate
scripts.generate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_DEVELOPMENT npx prisma generate
scripts.generate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_PRODUCTION npx prisma generate
